title: Darius Offense or Defense?
body: I've been playing Darius for a few days now and i was wondering if i should use 21/9 (offense) or 9/21 (defense)?

replies.body: You should definitely be taking 21/9/0 on Darius as he is one of the best lane bullies for the top lane. You should also be running heavy AD/AD PEN runes for Darius to ensure the best early game damage.
run 21/5/3 with full move speed quints out of mid and roam like hell, especially enemy jungle

**ALWAYS 21-9 ALWAYS!!!!!**

Even if its a lost lane, due to counter pick etc..

Just change your build path accordingly

**NEVER 9-21 NEVER!!!!**
your enemies should be taking 9/21 if they wanna handle dunkmaster D
Not many times I will go 9-21 unless I think Im going to lose the lane and have to be tanky to be relevant
